Package it.areson.interdimension.portals

Class PortalHandler

java.lang.Object
it.areson.interdimension.portals.PortalHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
PortalCountdownEndListener
public class PortalHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortalCountdownEndListener
Portal handler. Spawn new portals and receive countdown notifications.

      Returns:
